statements: SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data
SELECT id, location FROM e_waste_recycling_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE recycling_rate > 50
SELECT location, recycling_initiative FROM e_waste_recycling_data ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, recycling_initiative, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_data
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data ORDER BY location DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, location, recycling_initiative FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE recycling_rate > 50 ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE impact_report LIKE '%positive%' OR impact_report LIKE '%beneficial%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, recycling_initiative, location FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE recycling_rate > 0.00;
SELECT id, recycling_rate, impact_report FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE recycling_initiative = 'Community Recycling Program';
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE recycling_capacity > 100;

SELECT center_name, SUM(weight_kg) AS total_weight FROM e_waste_recycling_data JOIN e_waste_recycling_centers ON e_waste_recycling_data.center_id = e_waste_recycling_centers.center_id GROUP BY center_name;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE impact_score BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT center_name, location, recycling_capacity FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT center_name, location FROM e_waste_recycling_centers;
SELECT center_name, recycling_capacity FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE recycling_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY recycling_capacity DESC;

SELECT center_name, COUNT(data_id) AS num_records FROM e_waste_recycling_centers JOIN e_waste_recycling_data ON e_waste_recycling_centers.center_id = e_waste_recycling_data.center_id GROUP BY center_name ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND impact_score >= 80 ORDER BY weight_kg DESC, impact_score ASC;

SELECT center_name, SUM(weight_kg) AS total_weight FROM e_waste_recycling_centers JOIN e_waste_recycling_data ON e_waste_recycling_centers.center_id = e_waste_recycling_data.center_id GROUP BY center_name HAVING total_weight > 5000 ORDER BY total_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_rates WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_rates ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_initiatives WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT id, impact_score FROM e_waste_recycling_rates WHERE recycling_rate > 50;
SELECT evaluation_id, impact_description FROM recycling_impact_evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_rates WHERE recycling_rate > 50 ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT city, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_rates WHERE impact_score > 80 ORDER BY impact_score ASC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_initiatives FROM recycling_initiatives GROUP BY city HAVING total_initiatives > 2 ORDER BY total_initiatives DESC;

SELECT ri.initiative_name, re.impact_description FROM recycling_initiatives ri JOIN recycling_impact_evaluation re ON ri.initiative_id = re.initiative_id WHERE re.evaluation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT city, AVG(recycling_rate) AS avg_recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_rates GROUP BY city HAVING avg_recycling_rate >= 60 ORDER BY avg_recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_locations;
SELECT city, state FROM ewaste_locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM ewaste_recycling_facilities WHERE capacity > 10000;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_collection_records WHERE collection_weight > 500 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, process_date, recycling_rate FROM ewaste_recycling_facilities JOIN ewaste_recycling_rates ON ewaste_recycling_facilities.facility_id = ewaste_recycling_rates.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM ewaste_recycling_facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT r.facility_name, rr.process_date, rr.recycling_rate FROM ewaste_recycling_facilities r INNER JOIN ewaste_recycling_rates rr ON r.facility_id = rr.facility_id WHERE rr.process_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT l.city, f.facility_name, cr.collection_date FROM ewaste_locations l INNER JOIN ewaste_recycling_facilities f ON l.location_id = f.location_id INNER JOIN ewaste_collection_records cr ON f.facility_id = cr.facility_id WHERE l.state = 'California';

SELECT l.city, f.facility_name, cr.collection_date, cr.collection_weight FROM ewaste_locations l INNER JOIN ewaste_recycling_facilities f ON l.location_id = f.location_id INNER JOIN ewaste_collection_records cr ON f.facility_id = cr.facility_id WHERE cr.collection_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM e_waste_recycling_centers;
SELECT center_name, capacity FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;

SELECT center_name, COUNT(collection_id) AS total_collections FROM e_waste_recycling_centers JOIN e_waste_collection ON e_waste_recycling_centers.center_id = e_waste_collection.center_id GROUP BY center_name;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE center_id = 1;
SELECT center_name, location FROM e_waste_recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT collection_date, collected_items FROM e_waste_collection WHERE center_id = 2 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT impact_type, impact_description FROM e_waste_impact WHERE impact_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT stats_id, recycling_rate, impact_score FROM e_waste_stats WHERE impact_score >= 0.5;
